    level="1"

>
[Powerful Snares](/Feats.aspx?ID=516) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 174 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Snarecrafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=78) (Level 10)

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4); [Snare Specialist](/Feats.aspx?ID=506)

</column>

---

Your snares are particularly difficult for enemies to avoid. When you set a snare, the saving throw DC for that snare is equal to its normal DC or your class DC, whichever is higher.
